name: Retriever
description:
As a robot retriever, you will enter an abandoned institute and use your intelligence to take advantage of different robots' features, get over puzzles and bring them to the ground.

Tips Before You Download The Game:

1. This is a DEMO version of the game, there hasn't been more information about the later plan of the project.

2. There is no sound effect and BGM in DEMO version. 

3. The DEMO version is lack of  particle effects and some art assets.

4. This DEMO is for presenting the gameplay and it will take around 10 mins of your time.

5. Due to some bugs in new Unity Input System. Error on controlling might appear and it could be solve as long as you tap a few times on moving keys.

6. You might stuck in the scene and unable to finish the game in DEMO version. If you stuck, press F1 to go back to the last checkpoint. And don't rely too much on F1 since the reset function isn't fully finished. If you found your process was messed up after reset, please reopen the game. :)

Feel free to throw any feedbacks or bugs in the comment! :D

----中文版本----

下载前须知： 

1. 本游戏为DEMO版本，后续开发计划暂无

2. DEMO版本没有音效以及背景音乐

3. DEMO版本缺少许多素材以及没有粒子特效

4. DEMO版本仅为原型的玩法演示，流程大概在15分钟内

5. 由于新的Unity输入系统有一点框架bug，移动可能不会很流畅，也会出现自己移动的情况，重复输入移动键就能解决。

6.DEMO版本可能会卡关，如果发现卡关请使用F1键回到检查点。检查点的功效设计的不完善，如果发现回到检查点之后打乱了你的游戏进度，请重启游戏。

欢迎在评论中留下反馈或者可能的bug :D
